ai-patthana14.7:0.2_0: (The teachings should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana14.7:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the brief.
ai-patthana14.7:4.1_0: Placeful what is a reason for converse with the teaching.
ai-patthana14.7:5.1_0: for the sake of a single basis, two offenses,
ai-patthana14.7:5.1_1: lack of due respect for two,
ai-patthana14.7:5.1_3: said that the sound of conditioned phenomena is found.
